markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs=""
>
[Red-Rib Gill Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1447)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This mask is made from the gills of the red-rib salamander, an amphibious creature unique to Terwa Lake. Once activated, the mask intensifies the odors of gaseous toxins, allowing you to automatically detect toxic fumes within 30 feet and their approximate source (making the source [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) instead of [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41)). You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a _red-rib gill mask_.

 After Activating the mask, you also gain the listed item bonus to Fortitude saves against [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) effects; this bonus is increased against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Limited"
>
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +1, or +2 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Limited"
>
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2, or +3 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Limited"
>
Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3, or +4 against Dead Man's Breath, and the duration is 8 hours.
name: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)
